scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n browser,orchestrator,ui "npm run dev:browser" "npm run dev:orchestrator" "npm run dev:ui"
scripts.dev:browser: node scripts/free-dev-ports.mjs 3020 && npm run -w browser_agent dev:control
scripts.dev:orchestrator: npm run sync:knowledge && node scripts/free-dev-ports.mjs 3030 && npm run -w orchestrator dev
scripts.dev:ui: node scripts/free-dev-ports.mjs 5173 && npm run -w agent_interface dev -- --host 0.0.0.0 --port 5173
scripts.prepare:prod: npm run -w browser_agent build && npm run -w agent_interface build
scripts.start: concurrently -k -n browser,orchestrator,ui "npm run start:browser" "npm run start:orchestrator" "npm run -w agent_interface preview -- --host 0.0.0.0 --port 4173"
scripts.start:orchestrator: npm run sync:knowledge && npm run -w orchestrator start
